text: Aey logo! Hum ney tum sabb ko aik (hi) mard-o-orat say peda kiya hai aur iss liye kay tum aapas mein aik doosray ko pehchano kunbay aur qabeelay bana diye hain Allah kay nazdeek tum sabb mein say ba-izzat woh hai jo sabb say ziyadah darney wala hai yaqeen mano kay Allah dana aur ba-khabar hai
